item.title: Front-end Design - Static Site Generator
item.description: Summary Building this projects website was driven by a need to have an easy way showcase my projects without devoting a large amount of time to formatting and maintaining HTML code. The first iteration of my website was manually written in HTML/CSS. However I decided to port over to a website using Hugo’s framework which is fast and versitile. As such there exists static site generators available which are able to solve such a problem.
